Marketing H3

Quality Materials

  • Abec 5 bearingThe standard in the skateboarding industry. They roll very smooth and quiet.
  • Stainless Steel AxelMost companies use steel axel which cannot support near as much weight and can start to rust when used outside frequently.
  • 3” Polyurethane Rollerblade WheelsLarge diameter wheels make going over rough surfaces a breeze. The polyurethane material is the same used in roller blades. This makes the bag very smooth and quiet even over rough parking lots, tile flooring, and bad sidewalks.
  • Countered Rubber Lift HandlesThese handles make lifting a heavy bag much easier on your hands. The round countered shape will not dig into your hands.
  • Large Heavy Duty Commercial Grade ZippersWe only zippers that are built to last. We also use large zippers which make closing the bag much smoother.
  • 1680 Denier Ballistic Nylon FabricThis waterproof fabric will outlast other high quality luggage materials 3 to 1. It is easy to clean, looks very professional, does not pick up lint, and has a high abrasive tolerance.
  • Webbing Pull Tabs make closing zippers easierHolding these tabs as you pull on the zipper makes the bag close even easier
  • Telescoping Handle Plastic GuardsPlastic guards protect the aluminum rails against damage
  • Rounded Pull HandleTelescoping pull handle is rounded making pulling a heavy bag much more comfortable on your hands.
  • Add On StrapAll of our Professional and Oversized Sales Bags are equipped with a strap that can be used to piggyback a briefcase, purse, backpack, or any other small item.
"Our sports medicine department recently ordered 6 bags from Watts and we have been very pleased with what we received. The bags were hand made for us in just two weeks, with custom embroidery on the top and front. Watts was able to accommodate every request we made quickly and affordably.""

Mike McNulty -Chicago Cubs
